programme.desc: Lee McKenzie introduces coverage of the Japanese Grand Prix from the Suzuka circuit. McLaren's Lewis Hamilton is a previous winner, although his victory came at the Fuji Speedway circuit in 2007. Last year he managed a third-place finish here, but it was Red Bull's Sebastian Vettel who took the honours ahead of Jarno Trulli. programme.title: V Shest Chasov Vechera Posle Voyny
programme.desc: This Soviet oddity is a musical based on the recent wartime struggle between the Russians and the Nazis. Marina Ladynina and Eugene Samoilov play Varya Pankova and Lt. Kudrioshev, who despite the horrors and deprivations of war carry on an operetta-style romance. The two lovers promise to meet each other on a Moscow Bridge at Six O'Clock PM the moment peace is declared. Will they survive long enough for this romantic rendezvous? And what about Lt. Demidov (Ivan Lubeznov), Kudrioshev's rival for Marina's affections? American prints of Six PM were badly processed, making it difficult for US audiences to fully assess the film's value(n)

programme.title: Formula 1
programme.desc: Lee McKenzie introduces coverage of the Japanese Grand Prix from the Suzuka circuit. McLaren's Lewis Hamilton is a previous winner, although his victory came at the Fuji Speedway circuit in 2007. Last year he managed a third-place finish here, but it was Red Bull's Sebastian Vettel who took the honours ahead of Jarno Trulli. With Ferrari's Fernando Alonso another previous winner at this famously-demanding circuit, expect the competition to be fierce as the season nears its climax(n)

programme.desc: Cod. 403951. Serie A. 35a giornata. Collegamento ore 12:00 con Prepartita. programme.desc: Cod. 403995. Serie A. 35a giornata. Collegamento ore 14:30 con Sky Calcio Show. Emiliani con una striscia in corso di 2 vittorie e 2 pari. A Reggio Emilia hanno raccolto un solo punto (1-1 nel 2015) nei 3 precedenti di campionato contro la Fiorentina. Con 2 sconfitte nelle ultime 3 gare (1-2 Empoli e 2-0 Palermo) i viola si sono allontanati dall'Europa: -9 dal quinto posto dell'Atalanta. Commento: Marinozzi-Ambrosini(n)
